name: scutivion

scripts.build: rm -rf dist packages && mkdir -p dist/Core dist/Router dist/Protocols dist/Plugins packages && npx terser Core/ContextPool.js -o dist/Core/ContextPool.js && npx terser Core/HookSystem.js -o dist/Core/HookSystem.js && npx terser Core/CoreEngine.js -o dist/Core/CoreEngine.js && npx terser Router/TrieRouter.js -o dist/Router/TrieRouter.js && npx terser Protocols/HTTPProtocolAdapter.js -o dist/Protocols/HTTPProtocolAdapter.js && npx terser Protocols/TCPProtocolAdapter.js -o dist/Protocols/TCPProtocolAdapter.js && npx terser Protocols/WebSocketProtocolAdapter.js -o dist/Protocols/WebSocketProtocolAdapter.js && npx terser Protocols/HTTP2ProtocolAdapter.js -o dist/Protocols/HTTP2ProtocolAdapter.js && npx terser Protocols/UDPProtocolAdapter.js -o dist/Protocols/UDPProtocolAdapter.js && npx terser Plugins/FrameworkPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/FrameworkPlugin.js && npx terser Plugins/StructuredLoggingPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/StructuredLoggingPlugin.js && npx terser Plugins/SecurityPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/SecurityPlugin.js && npx terser Plugins/ResponseCompressionPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/ResponseCompressionPlugin.js && npx terser Plugins/FileStreamingPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/FileStreamingPlugin.js && npx terser Plugins/ObservabilityPlugin.js -o dist/Plugins/ObservabilityPlugin.js && npx terser index.js -o dist/index.js && cp index.d.ts dist/ && cp -r dist/* packages/ && node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); delete pkg.scripts; delete pkg.devDependencies; require('fs').writeFileSync('packages/package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));" && cp README.md packages/ && echo 'Build completed'
scripts.docs: jsdoc -d docs index.js Core/*.js Router/*.js Protocols/*.js Plugins/*.js

description: Scutivion: Futuristic high-performance Node.js framework inspired by UY Scuti, the largest supergiant star. Shield-like protection for hyperscale applications.
author: Muhammad Imam Rozali <muh.imamrozali@gmail.com>
